str2: First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
This; he, she, it.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To remember, call to mind, recall, mention. A prolonged form of mnaomai; to remind, i.e. to recall to mind.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
